section.p:
Ankh and Subversion has numerous features, options, but on a day-to-day basis, odds are that you will only use a few of them. In this section we'll run through the most common things that you might find yourself doing with Ankh in the course of a day's work.
A typical work cycle looks like this :
Update your working copy
Make changes
Adding files to the repository
Removing/deleting files from the repository
Examine your changes
Reverting changes
Commit your changes to the repository
